name: SmartLists
overview: Smart Playlists and Collections plugin for Jellyfin.
description: Create dynamic playlists and collections in Jellyfin based on a set of rules, which will automatically update as your library changes.

versions.changelog:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.13.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* You can now clone rule fields as well as clone and delete whole ruleblocks.
* You can now sort collections! (requires Jellyfin version 10.11.5)
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where the wrong user would be pre-selected when creating and cloning collections.
### Other Changes
* You can now close the notification popups


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartlists-plugin/compare/v10.11.12.1...v10.11.13.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.12.1 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* The LastPlayedDate rule now works with Collections as well.
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where audio playlists couldn't be sorted by name (track title).
* Fixed an issue where playback status wasn't working properly in some cases.
### Other Changes
* Added documentation icons + other minor UI changes


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartlists-plugin/compare/v10.11.12.0...v10.11.12.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.12.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Refactored playback status rule field. You can now also choose 'In Progress' for media items.
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed an issue where collections containing series would not get automatically updated.
* Fixed an issue where Jellyfin playlists wouldn't get deleted when disabled or converted into Collections.
### Other Changes
* Poster images in collections with episodes are now fetched from the parent series.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartlists-plugin/compare/v10.11.11.0...v10.11.12.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.11.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added support for multiple playlist users.
* Added support for choosing only Audio Languages marked as default
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue where user names could show up twice in the list filters.
* Fixed an issue where lists wouldn't update automatically when a media item was marked as unwatched.
### Other Changes
* Added a multi-select dropdown for media types.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartlists-plugin/compare/v10.11.10.0...v10.11.11.0

## Major update with support for Collections!

- Name changed from SmartPlaylist to **SmartLists**
- Support for **Collections** has been added.
- The entire codebase has been **refactored**
- A **status page** has been added
- And **many** other backend changes

### Breaking changes

- Migration logic from older versions has been removed, you must be running **Jellyfin 10.11.2.0** and have **refreshed all playlists** prior to updating â€” skipping this may result in broken playlists.
- The legacy Jellyfin tasks have been removed. Make sure no playlists are using these, and if so, set a custom schedule for them instead.

If you encounter issues where the plugin is stuck in a restart loop because of the name change, uninstall the plugin, remove the SmartPlaylist folder (there might be two, remove both) from your Jellyfin plugin folder, reboot Jellyfin and then install the plugin again

If you find any bugs, please report them here: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartlists-plugin/issues

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartlists-plugin/compare/v10.11.2.0...v10.11.10.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.2.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added support for multiple sorting options. Added Episode and Season as sorting options.
* Add sorting options for Last Played, Runtime, Series Name, Album Name and Artist.
* The rule fields Studios and Genres can now search parent series for episodes.
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed a bug where the UI would incorrectly always show "Sunday" for weekly schedules.
### Other Changes
* Only show sort options related to the media type(s) selected.
* Improved performance by using parallel processing for more fields.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.1.0...v10.11.2.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.1.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* You can now add multiple schedules.
* Added rule field support for: Actors, Directors, Producers, Writers, Guest Stars
* You can now choose which metadata properties to include when selecting the 'Similar To' rule field.
* Added support for the following audio metadata: Bitrate, Sample Rate, Bit Depth, Codec, Channels.
* Added conditional rule field visibility logic, only displaying the rule fields related to the chosen media type.
* Added support for all Jellyfin people fields.
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue where equals/not equals operators were missing for some rule fields.
* Fixed issue with the Collections rule field.
### Other Changes
* Simplified and optimized the AutoRefresh setting logic


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.11.0.1...v10.11.1.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.0.1 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added option to update playlists automatically based on library updates.
* You can now set individual playlist refresh schedules
* You can now sort by play count.
* Major improvements to the 'Manage Playlists' page (filter, bulk select, clone playlists, etc).
* Added "hours" option to the Newer Than/Older than operators and allow zero as value.
* Added option to ignore leading article 'The' when sorting by name
* You can now choose to include tags from parent Series for episodes.
* Sorting by name now takes into account if the name begins with numbers and sorts them properly.
* Added playlist statistics
* Added a link to the Jellyfin playlist in the properties table.
* Use parallel scans under specific conditions, added "Parallel Concurrency Limit" setting.
* You can now sort by track number
* Added "Similar To" rule field which finds items similar to a reference item based on shared metadata.
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue where the scheduled time for refresh would show wrong in the UI
* Some minor UI fixes and tweaks
### Other Changes
* Separated "Refresh All Playlists" logic from Jellyfin tasks.
* Minor sorting UI changes.
* Styling adjustments
* Various minor fixes and tweaks.
* Removed 'Series' media type due to Jellyfin limitations
* Implement time buffer checks for playlist refresh scheduling


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.9.1...v10.11.0.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.9.1 -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed rare race condition that could affect the media types of smart playlists


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.9.0...v10.10.9.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.9.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added support for media types Home Videos and Photos.
* Added support for Books and Audio Books.
### Other Changes
* Performance optimizations


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.8.1...v10.10.9.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.8.1 -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue with user matching on playlist import


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.8.0...v10.10.8.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.8.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added new Export/Import functionality in Settings.
* Some styling changes to mimic Jellyfin layout.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.7.0...v10.10.8.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.7.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added new Resolution rule field
* Added new Framerate rule field
* Added new Series Name rule field


### Bug Fixes
* You can now enter decimal values in integer fields (for example Community Rating)


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.6.1...v10.10.7.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.6.1 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* You can now include individual episodes from series within the Collections rule field
* Improvements to release date sorting
### Other Changes
* Code optimizations


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.6.0...v10.10.6.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.6.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added new IsIn/IsNotIn operator for matching multiple words
* Added new Collections rule field that searches for items belonging to a specific collection.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.5.3...v10.10.6.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.10.5.3 -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed caching issue which could cause wrong contents showing up in playlists


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-smartplaylist-plugin/compare/v10.10.5.2...v10.10.5.3
- PlaylistMediaType is now set to Video when the playlist only contains video files.

- Added support for Music Videos, thank you guluarte!
- Prevent search while playlists are loading
- Code optimizations

Added new rule field properties:
- 'Overview': For the media item description
- 'Last Played': When the media item was last played
- 'Next Unwatched': The next unwatched episode

Other changes:
- Changed the rule field categories to make a bit more sense
- Media type pre-filtering now uses API to increase performance
- Restructured code to make it easier to add new features

- You can now set a max play time for playlists
- Split scheduled tasks into two, one for video (hourly) and one for audio (daily)
- Fixed issue with config page causing styling errors

- You can now set your own suffix/prefix or even remove them completely
- Playlists are now connected with ID instead of name

NOTE: This change comes with a lot of backend changes. Make sure your playlists have refreshed once before changing name and/or owner to avoid duplicate Jellyfin playlists

New features:
- You can now choose an item limit when playlists are generated
- Added a 'Random' sort option for playlists

Fix:
- Now works properly with all Jellyfin 10.10.x versions
- Fix: Artists fields now work properly

- Added support for Artists and Album Artists.
- Sorted rule fields into categories for better overview.

New features:
- You can now target specific users for playback fields, such as IsPlayed.
- Added support for relative date comparisons ('Newer Than' and 'Older Than')
- Added 'After' and 'Before' operators for date fields (removed 'LessThan' and 'GreaterThan')
- Added support for Release Date

Fixes:
- Fixed bug for config page event listeners when using back/forward in browser.
- Date fields now work properly

- Added Series media type and renamed TV Shows to Episodes for clarity
- You can now search for users as well
- More styling changes to better match Jellyfin

- You can now search for playlists under Manage Playlists
- Styling changes to better match Jellyfin
- Various other tweaks and fixes

- Fix: Playlist covers are now regenerated properly (metadata refresh) when editing and refreshing playlists.
- Changed refresh task to trigger every hour instead instead of every 30 minutes.
- Various other enhancements and stability improvements.

New features and optimizations:

- You can now choose and mix AND/OR logic when creating rules
- Option to select media type first to go well in hand with the new rules logic
- Added flexible deletion options (config only vs config + playlist)
- Added regex validation
- Added option to enable/disable playlists
- Various performance optimizations

Also switched to Jellyfin version semantics.

Fixes:
- Prevent duplicate names when renaming smart playlists
- Delete old playlist when renaming a smart playlist

Optimizations:
- When creating and editing smart playlists, only refresh that specific list.
- Optimized and cleaned up code
Fix: Multiple playlists could get deleted after cancellation

New features:
- Edit existing playlists directly in the UI!
- Choose playlist owner from dropdown of all Jellyfin users
- User ID Migration: Automatic migration from usernames to User IDs for reliability

Plus some other fixes, enhancements and performance tweaks.
- Changed some log messages to DEBUG to not spam logs
- Added support for People metadata.
- Enhanced performance with optimized rule processing

Fixes:
- Playlist images are now populating again.
- Proper fix for null exception.

- New feature: Added rule field support for Audio Language
- Fix: Null reference when trying to populate playlist image cover for empty playlists
- Fix: Contains and Regex operators now match strings within lists, for example Studios.
- Added support for field rules: Is Played, Is Favorite, Play Count, Runtime, Parental Rating
- Added support for Tags field in rules.

- Works with newer Jellyfin versions
- UI to create and manage smart playlists

name: MusicTags
description: Automatically extract metadata from audio files - such as ID3 tags, Vorbis comments, and more - and convert them into standard Jellyfin tags.

versions.changelog:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.2.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added more comprehensive mapping for Apple/iTunes tags


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-musictags-plugin/compare/v10.11.1.2...v10.11.2.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.1.2 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* Added support for custom tags in wma and m4a audio files.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-musictags-plugin/compare/v10.11.1.1...v10.11.1.2

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.1.1 -->

## What's Changed
### Bug Fixes
* Fixed issue where some tags were not extracted properly.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-musictags-plugin/compare/v10.11.1.0...v10.11.1.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v10.11.1.0 -->

## What's Changed
### New Features
* You can now add custom delimiters to split tags
* You can now choose to inherit the tags to parent artists and albums.
* Added parallel processing for increased performance.


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/jyourstone/jellyfin-musictags-plugin/compare/v10.11.0.3...v10.11.1.0
Version bump
Added support for Jellyfin 10.11.0-rc5

- Performance enhancements
- Prevent duplicate scans running
- Now properly compatible with all Jellyfin 10.10.x versions
Removed INFO log messages to minimize log spam + some other minor changes
Initial release
